summary: A cable discusses SULUCKI's request for funds in anticipation of his wife's arrival in Mexico City for Christmas and mentions his living arrangement at the residence of Eliodorina Garcia, a PCM member.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable from Mexico City, dated December 19, discusses SULUCKI's anticipation of his wife's arrival in Merida on December 23, where she plans to spend Christmas with him and their children in Mexico City, prompting him to request $190 for the visit and gifts. The cable also notes that SULUCKI is living at the residence of Eliodorina Garcia, a PCM member who is a director of a nearby school where five PCM members are temporarily quartered, and that his family will reside with him at this address during their stay in Mexico.
title: SULUCKI's Wife's Visit and Funding Request
